Package com.jacobrymsza.librarymanagementsystem.controller.web

Class WebAuthorController

java.lang.Object
com.jacobrymsza.librarymanagementsystem.controller.web.WebAuthorController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/authors") public class WebAuthorController extends Object
MVC Controller for managing author-related operations in the library system. Provides endpoints for viewing, creating, and displaying author details via Thymeleaf templates.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAuthors

      @GetMapping public String getAllAuthors(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a list of all authors in the system.
      Parameters:
      model - the Spring MVC model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the Thymeleaf template for displaying the list of authors

    • showCreateAuthorForm

      @GetMapping("/new") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public String showCreateAuthorForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Shows the form for creating a new author.
      Parameters:
      model - the Spring MVC model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the Thymeleaf template for the author creation form

    • createAuthor

      @PostMapping("/new") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public String createAuthor(@Valid @ModelAttribute("author") @Valid AuthorDTO authorDTO, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Handles the submission of the new author form.
      Parameters:
      authorDTO - the DTO containing author details to be created
      result - the binding result for validation errors
      Returns:
      a redirect to the authors list on success, or the form template if validation fails

    • getAuthorById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public String getAuthorById(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays details of a specific author identified by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the author to retrieve
      model - the Spring MVC model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the Thymeleaf template for displaying author details
